item.title: Simple Green Bean Casserole
item.description: Quick Green Bean Casserole is a standard Recipe used for Holidays and everyday meals. Green Bean Casserole topped with Fried Onions and Cheese will Shake Up your Meals!A Simple and Healthy Green Bean CasseroleGreen Bean Casserole Ingredients *serves 8 -10â„‰ 2 cans green beans, drained 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1/2 c shredded or diced cheddar cheese (optional) 2 tbsp melted butter French fried onions Directions Mix green beans with undiluted mushroom soup and melted butter.
